H0.text: who became president when henry harrison died. Martin Van Buren

H1.text: who became president when henry harrison died. Daniel Webster

H2.text: who became president when henry harrison died. William Henry Harrison's Vice President before Tyler

H3.text: who became president when henry harrison died. John Tyler

A4.text: Tyler became the first vice president to succeed to the presidency.

A5.text: When he took office, Tyler, at 51, became the youngest president to that point.
